Welcome
This is BluModify app, which protects your devices from battery drain and redundant sharing of the Bluetooth signal.
BluModify app icon
Daily situation
Imagine you go to work listening to your favourite music. You go through mall to buy snacks, stop by in park and end up at work desk. You turn off the earbuds, but Bluetooth is still on and drains your battery.
Icon describing how the Bluetooth is draining the battery.
Be incognito
Active Bluetooth can be tracked and abused from outside. Attacker can make phishing attacks, steal private data or eavesdrop on your conversations. Even your own apps can determine location based on Bluetooth or abuse it in many other ways. Luckily, all of the attacks must occur within close range of you.
Icon describing how the Bluetooth is draining the battery.
What to do?
Turn off the Bluetooth and that is it.\n\nWith BluModify you can start tracking your Bluetooth activity. If no device is connected and Bluetooth is on, you will get notification about it. You can than decide if you want to turn off the Bluetooth. The detection runs every 15 mins approximately, so the app consumption is minimal. Unfortunately, the ability to turn off Bluetooth is solely in user\'s hands as Android removed this ability.
Sleeping Bluetooth icon.
Battery routines
Android is tampered with vendors battery optimisations. The proper working of the app might be influenced by these optimisations and the app can get unreliable. By adding the app to the whitelist, it may work better. You can still enable this option later in settings.

About BluModify
The BluModify serves to check on the Bluetooth activity and prevent redundant running of the Bluetooth on the phone. The running Bluetooth can lead to exploit of Bluetooth weaknesses and battery drainage. If the Bluetooth runs and there is no device connected, there is no point in running it. Here comes BluModify, which can alert you with notification about this situation and you can turn off the Bluetooth. Unfortunately, with advanced versions of Android, the Bluetooth can be turned off only manually by user.
